properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

properties.name: Enter Local Exchange ID to Fetch text from Notification
Provide Input token for Notification API

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Fetch the Notification Text Using Python

properties.display_name: Fetch the Notification Text Using Python
properties.script:
# Assuming 'data' is the list of dictionaries passed from another function
data = $activity.definition_activity_02GNPK6LRLXTP4OwLeADAeUJ684w7li4mJA.output.response_body$

# Define the ID you are looking for
search_id = "$workflow.definition_workflow_02GNPK3X9TDAX57MtwB2BQko1dQvsyxiYEv.input.variable_workflow_02GNPPL9P0KNT7i0EV8rlT8U3CkUERJtBMz$"

# Iterate over the list to find the text containing the ID
for item in data:
    if search_id in item['text']:
        notification_text = item['text']
        print("Notification Text:", notification_text)
        break
else:
    print("ID not found in any notification text.")

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Fetch the Notification Status Using Python

properties.display_name: Fetch the Notification Status Using Python
properties.script:
data = $activity.definition_activity_02GNPK6LRLXTP4OwLeADAeUJ684w7li4mJA.output.response_body$

# Define the substring you are looking for in the text
search_substring = "$workflow.definition_workflow_02GNPK3X9TDAX57MtwB2BQko1dQvsyxiYEv.input.variable_workflow_02GNPPL9P0KNT7i0EV8rlT8U3CkUERJtBMz$"

# Iterate over the list to find the ID based on the substring in the text
for item in data:
    if search_substring in item['text']:
        matched_id = item['status']
        #print(f"status for text containing '{search_substring}': {matched_id}")
        print(matched_id)
        break
else:
    print("Substring not found in any notification text.")

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Fetch the Notification ID Using Python

properties.display_name: Fetch the Notification ID Using Python
properties.script:
data = $activity.definition_activity_02GNPK6LRLXTP4OwLeADAeUJ684w7li4mJA.output.response_body$

# Define the substring you are looking for in the text
search_substring = "$workflow.definition_workflow_02GNPK3X9TDAX57MtwB2BQko1dQvsyxiYEv.input.variable_workflow_02GNPPL9P0KNT7i0EV8rlT8U3CkUERJtBMz$"

# Iterate over the list to find the ID based on the substring in the text
for item in data:
    if search_substring in item['text']:
        matched_id = item['id']
        #print(f"ID for text containing '{search_substring}': {matched_id}")
        print(matched_id)
        break
else:
    print("Substring not found in any notification text.")
